item.title: Travis CI
item.author: iris.garcia.desebastian@gmail.com (Iris Garcia)
item.description: Description Travis is a hosted continuous integration service used to build and test software projects hosted at GitHub. It provides a free plan for open source projects which is very convinient for our use case. The whole configuration is set up in a single file .travis.yml which must be placed in the root directory of the project. Configuration
